titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 112) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2003, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-718, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 112 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 224.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 568.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 206 - 198 (Roll no. 438).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/2/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 112 (making further continuing appropriations for FY 2003).
